title: Getting Started with Next.js
content:
Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes it easy to build production-ready applications.

In this article, we'll explore the basics of Next.js and how to get started.
excerpt: Learn the basics of Next.js and start building your first application
meta_title: Getting Started with Next.js - Complete Guide
meta_description: Learn how to get started with Next.js and build modern web applications

title: Introduction to TypeScript
content:
TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, making your code more robust and maintainable.

Learn how TypeScript can help you write better code.
excerpt: A comprehensive introduction to TypeScript for JavaScript developers

title: Understanding CSS Grid
content:
CSS Grid is a powerful layout system that allows you to create complex layouts with ease.

This guide will teach you everything you need to know about CSS Grid.
excerpt: Master CSS Grid and create beautiful, responsive layouts
